text: Michel Sitjar (13 September 1942 – 10 June 2019) was a French rugby union player. He played as a flanker. He played 13 matches for the France national team between 1964 and 1967. He also played club rugby for Sporting Union Agenais and also rugby league team XIII Catalan. He was born in Castelsagrat. Sitjar died by suicide (killed himself) on 10 June 2019 in Lamagistère. He was 76. ==References== ==Other websites== *Michel Sitjar at ESPN Scrum Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:People from Tarn-et-Garonne Category:Rugby league players Category:French rugby union players Category:Suicides in France Category:Sportspeople who committed suicide Category:Sportspeople from Occitanie
title: Michel Sitjar
